last_episode_to_air.name: Controlled Flight Into Terrain
last_episode_to_air.overview: A brutal battle for control leaves the Colorado vulnerable to capture by a third party with a manipulative plan.

name: Last Resort
overview: When the crew of the U.S. ballistic missile submarine Colorado refuse to fire nuclear weapons at Pakistan without confirmation of the orders, they are fired upon and declared rogue enemies of their own country.

episodes.name: Captain
episodes.overview: With nowhere left to turn, a nuclear missile sub Captain and his XO go on the run and bring their crew to an exotic island.

episodes.name: Blue On Blue
episodes.overview: More than 20 warships close in on the Colorado; as Kendal is forced into a battle on the ground, Prosser questions Marcus' judgement

episodes.name: Eight Bells
episodes.overview: Aa search for three missing crew members leads to Serrat's compound and an ominous demand. A clandestine meeting between Kylie and Admiral Shepard confirms that the fire order came through a back channel.

episodes.name: Voluntold
episodes.overview: Marcus and Sam learn they have been charged with treason; a threat brews among the group; an old friend of Sam's visits Christine.

episodes.name: Skeleton Crew
episodes.overview: In an attempt to end the standoff on Sainte Marina, Marcus and Sam enter into tense negotiations with the U.S. Government. Meanwhile, when a critical system fails, Grace must take command of the Colorado on a perilous repair operation.

episodes.name: Another Fine Navy Day
episodes.overview: The crew is attacked by an unknown force unlike any other; Sam and Marcus race to save the sub and protect the island.

episodes.name: Nuke it Out
episodes.overview: Sam and Marcus look for the traitor who stole the nuclear launch key; when Prosser disobeys orders, he starts a conflict he can't control; Grace and James try to defuse a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: Big Chicken Dinner
episodes.overview: Marcus brings the islanders and the members of the Colorado together for a feast in the spirit of Thanksgiving; Grace searches for the truth when an essential crew member is accused of a crime.

episodes.name: Cinderella Liberty
episodes.overview: The crew waits for a visit from its families; Marcus must contemplate the unthinkable; the reason for the attack on Pakistan is revealed.

episodes.name: Blue Water
episodes.overview: Sam and James depart the island in a daring rescue attempt. Back on the island of Sainte Marina, a Chinese diplomat arrives to make a deal with Marcus. With scarcity and a prison problem plaguing him, Marcus finds himself treading down a more treacherous path than he could have imagined.

episodes.name: Damn the Torpedoes
episodes.overview: A typhoon, a mutiny and a Washington coup d'etat will force Marcus and his crew into unlikely alliances. As Sam's grief strains his loyalty to Marcus, will Sainte Marina get the supplies it so desperately needs? How far will Marcus go to ensure the crew's survival -- will it cost him his life?

episodes.name: The Pointy End of the Spear
episodes.overview: Kylie works with Admiral Shepard to bring down the President, using evidence of what really happened in Pakistan.

episodes.name: Controlled Flight Into Terrain
episodes.overview: A brutal battle for control leaves the Colorado vulnerable to capture by a third party with a manipulative plan.
